short.ar: Knife Hit it Right هي لعبة إطلاق نار ممتعة حيث يجب علينا رمي السكاكين بعناية على الأهداف المختلفة التي نصادفها.

short.bg: Knife Hit it Right е забавна игра със стрелба, в която трябва внимателно да хвърляме ножове по различните цели, които срещаме.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hit it Right is a fun shooter game where we must throw knives carefully at the different targets we come across.
There are different objectives in the game. We ask them to throw knives at these targets. The number of blades we throw at targets varies. We pass the sections by carefully throwing the desired number of knives at the targets. We unlock different targets by passing the levels. And continue the game by having the opportunity to throw knives at targets for long periods. Throw the Knife has emerged as an aiming game designed for us knife game lovers, which is fun and challenging.

To swipe Install this extension to play the Hit it Right Game or offline with no additional downloads and no ads. 

You can contact us at support@724fun.com and share your thoughts and problems

After clicking the add the game to chrome button, you can find the game in the extensions section. If you wish, you can visit 724fun.com. If you wish, you can play again and if you want to remove it, you can remove it from the extensions section.
